plot: A veterinarian (Daily) with two teenagers faces the return of his ex-wife (Stevens), who has left her new husband, in this syndicated series.
plot_en: A veterinarian (Daily) with two teenagers faces the return of his ex-wife (Stevens), who has left her new husband, in this syndicated series.
plot_es: A veterinarian (Daily) with two teenagers faces the return of his ex-wife (Stevens), who has left her new husband, in this syndicated series.
title: Starting from Scratch
